website_summaries.verdict: A vibrant print of a well-known powerful Japanese image.
pros: Showcases The Great Wave Off Kanagawa
Thicker than expected fabric for the cost
Comes with a convenient gift bag
cons: Part of the original print is cut off on this reproduction

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous wall art!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Fast shipping! - Easy to iron out packaging lines! - Lovely colors! - Looks amazing on almost any room theme! - Not cheap material! Cons: - Will clash with other colors that aren’t brown, beige, white, or black. If you’re wall has other decor that’s not in that theme, it will clash hardcore! - Up close, print is kinda blurry but it is to be expected when you order such a huge tapestry of a painting! No worries tho! Very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: J Luna

customer_reviews.title: Unique!
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is so cool and unique, the material is different and not that of other tapestries I have had in the past that have a "cotton" feel. Although, the material is different I actually like it and wish more were made of it. It is smooth and up close looks like a vintage blur, but far away it is so pretty and if paired with white christmas lights, it is stunning. 10 out of 10, I love it and receive many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Keara

customer_reviews.title: Great Tapestry!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The size was perfect and it makes my room look great! The picture is a tiny bit blurry but only when you look really close up. I love the fabric-ish feel its made of, really gives off that true tapestry vibe. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Burke

customer_reviews.title: Wall Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tapestry for an amazing price. Looks great on the wall, and it's larger than I imagined. All in all a great buy, I will definitely buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Happy hippie
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! If you look up close it’s slightly blurry but with the picture I’ve provided you really can see yet doesn’t matter. No one is going to be face to face with it let’s be real people. It’s beautiful and I’m so happy with it! Material is also nice!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rod

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, love the graphics. However, the fabric is a lot thinner than expected. I would recommend this product if you're looking for something cheap and don't mind too much about the quality. If you're looking for something fancier, I would suggest purchasing a more expensive tapestry. Otherwise, this is a perfect piece for adding some decoration to your room. Shipping was very fast, came in about 3-4 days and came earlier than the estimated delivery date. :)
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: I Would Totally Buy More
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this but it is gorgeous. I hang it over my bed and it doesnt get pixelated until you're literally 6 inches away from it (if that). I LOVE this tapestry, this is one of my favorite prints of all time and I was equally excited and nervous to see how it would look. I've had it for a year now and I love it. I use command strips to keep it up and that's always worked great. Comes wrinkled bc it is folded, but ironing on low will fix that in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love! Super perfect for over our bed. Not too feminine or masculine. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this tapestry
customer_reviews.text: I love this tapestry! Looks great, but my only complaint is that in person the picture does look a little blurry. But overall it's great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: garys*gal

customer_reviews.title: Actually 57x79
customer_reviews.text: Not 59x82! I built a frame before measuring and now it won’t fit. An accurate measurement would’ve been appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Material
customer_reviews.text: I had intended to use this as a tapestry but upon receipt, the material was like a waterproof material (think shower curtain) and the edges were unfinished. I ended up using it to reupholster my dining room chairs and they look so rad! It’s such a cool design so there are probably lots of ways to use this for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Runnion

customer_reviews.title: looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We were ready to return it, but looks great and pigmented even in this large a size. It's the accent wall in my boyfriend's apartment bedroom and it really brings the room together.
customer_reviews.author: Tuyetson

customer_reviews.title: It's like literal cloth
customer_reviews.text: It's just a cloth print. I've had it thumb tacked onto my wall for like a year now, and I gaze upon it all the time. It's a wonderful print, and I enjoy it, but the creases/folds are pretty severe, meaning there's lines throughout. But hey, for the price? 5/5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DarkWestern

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: Made a frame for mine & it looks like a $100 painting now. Will consider making more because I like the canvas look over just a hanging tapestry. I used a steamer to remove the fold lines. Thin but not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Weber

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to me, but I can see why it wouldn’t be to others
customer_reviews.text: This product is an odd one. I don’t hate it, but I can’t say it’s a good product. The print quality is pretty bad, and the tapestry itself is rather thin. It’s a bad product, but I honestly don’t mind the quality. It brings my room together rather well. So, if you can deal with a bit of pixelation and creases, then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: joe gess

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but first the positives. Arrived on time and came in a really nice zip package. Not so positives the printing is blurry. Fabric is the quality you would find at a swapmeet. I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Plesently surprised. Good quality, thicker than I thought it would be. A quick iron and no creases. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alright colors and quality.
customer_reviews.text: The print and colors are slightly less vibrant than in the pictures, but from a normal viewing distance, the print is well done and easy on the eyes. The quality of the fabric is heavier and more rigid than other tapestry fabrics. When first taken out of the packaging, there will be creases. I would recommend ironing it out before hanging it up.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: Really really blurry, only buy for a dark bedroom, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love this tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Covers a big hallway wall that looked very empty before this. It's a beautiful tapestry. If you get up close to it, the print/picture quality isn't perfect...but from a few feet away or further, it looks perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his dorm room wall. He loves it. The picture is well printed and the material is lightweight. We put it up on the wall using command strip poster strips in each corner and the middle of all the sides.
customer_reviews.author: dawnygurl

customer_reviews.title: Just like it looks
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tapestry that I own. It’s up in my bedroom and accents the plants and furniture wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: Emma K

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall hanging - but it’s missing a portion of the original artwork
customer_reviews.text: Nice wall hanging - it virtually transformed our living room! The material and the graphics are great. I would have given it 5 stars but you get what you pay for - it’s missing the left side of the actual painting. But that aside my wife and kids really like it.
customer_reviews.author: AFC

customer_reviews.title: Its a Nice print with decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: By no means is this a poor quality print. I purchased this for my dorm room and it is a great decoration addition. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a large decently priced wall cover, as this adds a nice quality to the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very light, and hangs beautifully. Vivid colors, and my daughter is obsessed with the art. She has the Hokusai-inspired print. Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: SD and TS

customer_reviews.title: Big wave, big impact
customer_reviews.text: I like this much more than I thought I would. It was only meant to provide a bit of motion and color to a blank wall above my bed. It is so nice that I decided to do my master bed and bath in a Japanese theme around the tapestry. .
customer_reviews.author: Vagabond

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sucker was huge. Took up almost the entire wall. Please be sure to measure first. We still love it. It's one of my daughters favorite prints. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tapestry ever.
customer_reviews.text: Resolution on the pic is a little bit distorted but it could be because it is so big. Definitely covered up a huge portion of my wall and looks amazing nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: YouTube Ruined Me

customer_reviews.title: Very good and BIG
customer_reviews.text: Very good print in all.A lot bigger then I expected.Very good overall. In my opinion I really like the tapestry.
customer_reviews.author: virginia coyle

customer_reviews.title: It's nice.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, colors are less vivid than showed though. The fabric is thin so you can easily put it up with pushpins. I recommend the larger size as it will cover your wall better and nicer in my opinion. Some parts of it seem to be glow in the dark, but randomly so it looks strange at night.
customer_reviews.author: Mil. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great price and looks awesome in my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Klug

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect decor for my room and motivating me to learn Japanese everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Guerzon

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my great wave tapestry and saddened I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous!! I am in love with my great wave tapestry and saddened I did not discover this during my college days. The quality is fantastic and my room looks a little less cramped because I've got it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but Pricey...arrives wrinkled with creases
customer_reviews.text: Is blurry but its almost like a watercolor effect I bought the biggest size The colors are kinda faded I like it a lot but i would maybe lower price to 15 or 20. I guess it hiked up because i chose the biggest size which covers most of my dorm room wall
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Got this for granddaughter and she loved this tapestry. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: PHYLLIS Ashley-Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Print quality is great! Fabric is nice quality. It’s really big! I got it for my daughters room and she had to fold it a bit to fit the wall but it looks fab!
customer_reviews.author: Shauni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm or apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tapestry to decorate my apartment and to fill up this empty wall space in my room. I was so surprise to find that it was true to size and maybe well. It doesn’t look like a cheap print and the fabric looks pretty sturdy. I’m happy to say that this picture is an eye catcher and is really beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 tapestries and this one is probably one of the better ones, I’m used to giant ones so this one was a bit smaller but just hung it above my table to even it out.
customer_reviews.author: izzy savage

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't purchase this because of the negative reviews but I'm glad that I did. The tapestry looks beautiful in my living room and it is HUGE. What a great purchase at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylyn Z.

customer_reviews.title: Cool great addition to any room has a neat meaning and story too
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my bedroom wall above my bed I love it’s meaning and history
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Geis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I realized but still perfect!! Always remember to check your dimensions
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly,it looks amazing! Would buy more but my walls are filled xD
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Really thin, print is not that great
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that it tore easily, print was a 5/10 and the material is so ugly. Still hung it though because it was a good price
customer_reviews.author: Mario Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because it had good reviews but I was a little disappointed in the quality of the image.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bday present
customer_reviews.text: I definitely got what I paid for! While the thickness of the tapestry left much to desired, the quality of the design was perfect. It's a great size and worth the price to see that smile on his face.
customer_reviews.author: robert arroyo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the size of the tapestry but the quality of the print is very cheap looking. If you want a nice/decent looking print you’d probably have to pay more.

customer_reviews.title: the item looks nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.text: the item looks nothing like the photo. the tapestry is poorly printed and the material is very thin. do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Irie De La Fuente

customer_reviews.title: Great For Tying a Room Together!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful tapestry. The print quality is excellent and the fabric is durable but not too thick. Was able to hang on my wall with some command sticky squares! The size was perfect and it really brought my room together.
customer_reviews.author: Briar

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: My couch hides a little of it but I absolutely love this tapestry!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse J.

customer_reviews.title: Bright! Colorful! She loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: The tapestry was a great gift for my daughter. The colors are bright and the size is perfect as a wall hanging.
customer_reviews.author: S. King

customer_reviews.title: ... elsewhere but it was an okay price for a pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: Found one cheaper elsewhere but it was an okay price for a pretty good product. Pretty good material as well.
customer_reviews.author: YggdrasilYggy

customer_reviews.title: Cool little wall hanger
customer_reviews.text: It won’t look like an original, as to be expected from something that costs less than TWENTY BUCKS. Still pretty awesome though!
customer_reviews.author: Mafe Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this product. It looks awful, the print is blurry no matter how far away you get. Not only that but instead of making it easy to return, you have to go all the way to a UPS store just to send it back. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: No frame
customer_reviews.text: Great buy would have been better if frame was provided.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Deoyos

customer_reviews.title: The colors are vibrant and the art is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of art, really gave life to my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan martin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and made of nice quality. Picture for product makes the tapestry appear ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and made of nice quality. Picture for product makes the tapestry appear much bigger than it actually is (even though it's not a bad size as is). Overall, very nice tapestry and it's a great addition to my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Dinkel

customer_reviews.title: Tapestry
customer_reviews.text: Great for my son who love anime and Japanese stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth what I paid
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much and knew it wasn’t going to be high quality, but worth what I paid. Just needed something up In the apartment so I was surrounded by white walls. Worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Niceeeee
customer_reviews.text: I live in military barracks so the walls are quite small for my room. I bought the biggest size and it automatically made my room pop much more covering a lot of ugly eggshell paint colored walls lol. Worth the money, overall happy.
customer_reviews.author: dom

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tapestry
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! Fits a little small hanging over my queen headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Atom Herr

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks so great on the wall! Tons of compliments. Only regret is I didn’t go bigger!! So cool!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son is a big fan. 1 whole wall covered. No painting for him haha
customer_reviews.author: marilyn estrella

customer_reviews.title: Print quality is ok
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly disappointed in the print quality but overall I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stone

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Its still hanging in my room.
customer_reviews.text: The print is very good quality and good material . so you dont have to worry about how it looks because it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hundred Eyes

customer_reviews.title: This tapestry is wonderful! I bought the largest size and was excited ...
customer_reviews.text: This tapestry is wonderful! I bought the largest size and was excited to hang it up! It makes my one-bedroom apt look cozy and peaceful and gives it a splash of color! The fabric is light and holds easily with a few push pins. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Bartholomay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I originally thought and the print is kinda unclear but other than that its great. The problems are excusable because of the price so its all good!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cropped.
customer_reviews.text: Not as pictured. The picture itself is cut off and looks bad. Probably going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tapestry
customer_reviews.text: It’s Fantastic. Need to iron it in the beginning, but overall is stunning. It can be held up by tacs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Lacasse

customer_reviews.title: Large art without the cost
customer_reviews.text: Fits the wall perfectly and the quality is great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Creased
customer_reviews.text: When I got my mine I was very happy with it and I still am but it came folded in the package and it is very creased either than that I love it and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: Fasho
customer_reviews.text: It looks great. My wife bought this for me as a surprise - The Great Wave is my favorite piece of art. I’m satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: TriStan

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, it looks great
customer_reviews.text: This honestly looks great and I've had it on my wall for months. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Quality is better than most tapestries I have found. The image is printed on the fabric, so if it is important for you that you can reverse the tapestry, then this is not for you. It is much larger than I thought, and I am very excited as it covers the majority of my wall (and I have high ceilings!).
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty cheap (to be expected). I returned dit.
customer_reviews.author: Millennial Man

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: Wish the print was brighter and more detailed. Still looks pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Anali

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The picture made it look bright colors like you was right there at the ocean and when it came in the color was not as bright kind of dough looking
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and looks great i stare at it before bed its very calming.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and huge. Print is crisp even at such a large size.
customer_reviews.author: Cosplays f.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: was just as advertized. good quality. price was great. very very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Zindorf

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, was worried it was going to be too small, and it fit just right, its pretty big. Exactly how big I wanted it to be.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage sons room to hang on hia wall. Looks beautiful and artsy.

customer_reviews.title: Great Found Addition
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised on the size and hangs perfectly over bed mattress. Great addition to arrangements.

customer_reviews.title: tapestry review
customer_reviews.text: it’s nice, easy to fold and put away or to put up.

customer_reviews.title: Not "super" vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are not as bright as I was expecting and it is made of a synthetic compound. Otherwise it is a great addition to my room.

customer_reviews.title: Same as picture, all expectations met
customer_reviews.text: I hung this up outside in my “she-shed” and it’s really nice colors are vibrant, looks like picture

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: So incredible. The tapestry is beautiful and obviously incredibly affordable. I'm so glad I got the bigger size. So beautiful next to the hanging lights I have in my room. The image isn't distorted or too blurry.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Soft and thick layer of print. Not pixelated or blurry. Sharp detail and solid colors.

customer_reviews.text: Ilove the ocean so either way i woulda liked it

customer_reviews.text: Put up in my dorm and it was perfect took up a large portion of the wall and much better to look at rather than cinderblocks lol

customer_reviews.text: The colors are bold and amazing , and my son absolutely loves it. The material is quality, I give it 10 stars!!

product_meta.title: Martine Mall Tapestry Wall Tapestry Wall Hanging Tapestries The Great Wave Off Kanagawa Katsushika Hokusai Thirty-six Views Mount Fuji Tapestry Wall Art (The Great Wave Off Kanagawa, 51" x 59")
product_meta.description:
Color:The Great Wave Off Kanagawa| Size:51.2" x 59.1"Looking for a special piece of home decor to change your room from ordinary to extraordinary? 

MARTINE MALL artistic The Great Wave Off Kanagawa pattern tapestry is an essential elements to decorate your home. This The Great Wave Off Kanagawa tapestry hanging on wall and really brings your room to life. It is perfect for a wall hanging, tablecloth, beach forts, dorm room, window curtain or other room idea.

It is sold as an economy size of generous extra-large 92" x 71" / 235cm x 180cm, large 82" x 59" / 210cm x 150cm or medium 59" x 51" / 150cm x130cm tapestry so they are also affordable and perfect for using in different ways to decor home like as bed throw, bed spread, bed cover, table throw, table cloth or just a sofa cover.

The Great Wave Off Kanagawa Tapestry Specifications:
Material: Superior microfiber peach.
Size: Medium: 59"W x 51"H ( 150cm x 130 cm); Large: 82"W x 59"H (210cm x 150cm); Extra-large: 92"W x 71"H (235cm x 180cm).
Machine wash cold on gentle cycle, tumble dry low, don't bleach or iron.
Usages: Bed Cover, Tapestry, Curtain Or Table Cloth. 
Occasions: Suitable for home, office, restaurant, dinning area, windows, kitchen, toilet, bathroom, bedroom, compound area...

The Great Wave Off Kanagawa Tapestry Features:
The Great Wave Off Kanagawa pattern design, printed on one side.
Featuring vivid colors and crisp lines, these highly unique and versatile tapestries are durable enough for both indoor and outdoor use.
Friendly recycle tapestries will last many years.

How to Care for Your Tapestry?
1. Hand Wash / Cold Water / Hang Dry.
2. Do NOT use bleach.
3. Remove directly after cycle. 
4. Dry flat or hang to dry in a shaded area. 
5. Never use a drying machine. 
6. Do NOT hang in direct sunlight for long time.

Package Included:
1 x handmade The Great Wave Off Kanagawa tapestry
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR QUALITY: Made of microfiber peach with printed top and hand-sewn finished edges, this handmade ocean wave tapestry is infinitely superior to other materials
FOUR DISTINCT SIZES AVAILABLE: There are four dictinctive size: 51.2" x 59.1" / 130cm x 150cm, 59.1" x 59.1" / 150cm x 150cm, 59.1" x 82.7" / 150cm x 210cm and 70.9" x 92.5" / 180cm x 235cm

UNIQUE DESIGN: This artistic ocean wave tapestry shows a perfect union of it’s style, final detail and craftsmanship. It is unique, relying on a combination of good design craftsmanship and qualified materials for it’s effect
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Hand wash or machine wash under gentle cycle. Please use mild detergent with cold water. Do not iron. Do not scrub it hard and prevent sharp things and insolation
INDOOR & OUTDOOR ESSENTIALS: Features stylish design and well made craftsmanship, these artistic ocean wave hanging tapestries are versatile and time proof for both indoor and outdoor use
GIFT READY: Each ocean wave tapestry will be packaged in a convenient bag, which makes it a wonderful gift for your girl, friends or family members
